resources.string: This sample shows how to launch [Custom Tabs](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/android/custom-tabs/) using both an `Activity` `Context` and an `Application` `Context`.
When using an **`Activity`** `Context`, the Custom Tab is launched within the **same `Activity`**.
In contrast, when using an **`Application`** `Context`, the Custom Tab is launched within a **new `Activity`**.
